subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Pyro showed he is one of the top 3-year-old colts with a powerful victory in the Grade III $300,000 Risen Star Stakes at the Fair Grounds in New Orleans, the final prep for the Louisiana Derby. Pyro, who has been working out in the mornings with the horse of the year, Curlin, for the trainer Steve Asmussen, is a top Kentucky Derby contender. Last at the top of the stretch, Pyro angled out for running room under Shaun Bridgemohan and came roaring down the center of the track in the final furlong to win by two lengths over his stablemate Z Fortune.
